raw:
Arnold: Hey guys, have you ever played Yu-Gi-Oh?

Rachel: Yeah, I used to play it a lot when I was younger.

Sam: I've heard of it, but never played it. What's it all about?

Arnold: It's a trading card game where you battle with monsters and spells against other players.

Rachel: The goal is to reduce your opponent's life points to zero before they do the same to you.

Sam: That sounds pretty cool. How do you play?

Arnold: Each card has a set of stats and abilities that you can use to attack your opponent's monsters or activate different effects.

Rachel: There are also different types of monsters, like dragons, zombies, and warriors, and different elements like fire, water, and wind.

Sam: Whoa, there are a lot of cards to keep track of. Is it hard to play?

Arnold: It can be a little overwhelming at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's really fun.

Rachel: Plus, there are different formats you can play, like casual matches or tournaments.

Sam: I think I might have to give it a try.

Arnold: Definitely! We can have a Yu-Gi-Oh night and teach you how to play.

sentences.text: Hey guys, have you ever played Yu-Gi-Oh?
sentences.textPhonetics: "Hey gaɪz, hæv ju ɛvər pleɪd juː gi oʊ?"

sentences.text: Yeah, I used to play it a lot when I was younger.
sentences.textPhonetics: "Yeah, ai juːst tu pleɪ ɪt ə lɑt wɛn ai wəz jʌŋgər."

sentences.text: I've heard of it, but never played it. What's it all about?
sentences.textPhonetics: aɪv hɜrd ʌv ɪt, bʌt nɛvər pleɪd ɪt. wɑts ɪt ɔl əbaʊt?

sentences.text: It's a trading card game where you battle with monsters and spells against other players.
sentences.textPhonetics: ɪts ə tɹeɪdɪŋ kɑːd ɡeɪm wɛə juː bætəl wɪð mɒnstərz ənd spɛlz əɡɛnst ʌðər pleɪəz.

sentences.text: The goal is to reduce your opponent's life points to zero before they do the same to you.
sentences.textPhonetics: ðə gōl ɪz tu rəˈdus jɔr əˈpoʊnənts laɪf pɔɪnts tu ˈzɪroʊ bɪˈfɔr ðeɪ du ðə seɪm tu ju.

sentences.text: That sounds pretty cool. How do you play?
sentences.textPhonetics: /ðæt saʊndz ˈprɪti kul. haʊ du jʊ pleɪ/

sentences.text: Each card has a set of stats and abilities that you can use to attack your opponent's monsters or activate different effects.
sentences.textPhonetics: /iːʧ kɑrd hæz ə set əv stæts ænd əˈbɪlətiz ðæt ju kæn yus tu əˈtæk jɔr əˈpoʊnənt's ˈmɑnstərz ɔr ˈæktəveɪt ˈdɪfərənt ɪˈfɛkts/.

sentences.text: There are also different types of monsters, like dragons, zombies, and warriors, and different elements like fire, water, and wind.
sentences.textPhonetics: ðɛr ɑr ɔlso ˈdɪfrənt taɪps əv ˈmɑnstərz, laɪk ˈdrægənz, ˈzɑmbiz, ənd ˈworjərz, ənd ˈdɪfrənt ˈɛləmənts laɪk ˈfaɪr, ˈwɔtər, ənd ˈwɪnd.

sentences.text: Whoa, there are a lot of cards to keep track of. Is it hard to play?
sentences.textPhonetics: "Woʊ, ðɛr ɑr ə lɒt ʌv kɑrdz tu kip træk ʌv. ɪz ɪt hɑrd tu pleɪ?"

sentences.text: It can be a little overwhelming at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's really fun.
sentences.textPhonetics: /ɪt kæn bi ə lɪtəl oʊvərwɛlmɪŋ æt fɜrst bʌt wʌns ju ɡɛt ðə hæŋ ʌv ɪt ɪts rɪli fʌn/

sentences.text: Plus, there are different formats you can play, like casual matches or tournaments.
sentences.textPhonetics: plʌs ðɛr ɑr ˈdɪfərənt ˈfɔrmæts ju kən pleɪ, laɪk ˈkæʒuəl ˈmætʃɪz ɔr ˈtʊrnmənts.

sentences.text: I think I might have to give it a try.
sentences.textPhonetics: aɪ θɪŋk aɪ maɪt hæv tu ɡɪv ɪt ə traɪ.

sentences.text: Definitely! We can have a Yu-Gi-Oh night and teach you how to play.
sentences.textPhonetics: /dɛfɪnɪtli! wi kæn hæv ə ju-gi-oʊ naɪt ənd tiʧ ju haʊ tu pleɪ./
